function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study of bacterial communities in a business complex may reveal potential disease-carrying pathogens.","Impact":"Potential risk of infectious diseases spreading in the business complex if disease-carrying pathogens are present.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection and cleaning of the business complex to reduce the presence of disease-carrying pathogens.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems and UV-C light disinfection technology can reduce the presence of disease-carrying pathogens in the air and on surfaces.","People":"Occupants and visitors of the business complex.","Owner":"Building management and cleaning staff."}]}
